name: kuxtaj-app
description: Discover outdoor activities near you, Kuxtaj means living in Mayan. I belive that by doing outdoor activities you live your life to the fullest, I am from Guatemala and I thought about naming the App with something very native, so I decided to use the Mayan word Kuxtaj(living) to name the app.
